DOC.brief_title: Mass Balance Recovery , Metabolite Profile Metabolite Identification 14CNXL104
DOC.detailed_description: An Open Label Single-Dose Study Healthy Male Subjects Designed Assess Mass Balance Recovery , Metabolite profile Metabolite Identification [ 14C ] NXL104 .
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent prior study specific procedure . Healthy male subject age 3065 year inclusive . Male subject willing use adequate method contraception ( defined Section 5.1 ) day dose 3 month dose investigational product . Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18 32 kg/m2 inclusive weigh least 50 kg 100 kg . Clinically normal physical examination laboratory finding judge investigator , include negative test result drug abuse , alcohol , CO breath test negative test result Hepatitis B surface antigen , antibody Hepatitis C. Any clinically significant disease disorder ( e.g . cardiovascular , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , liver , renal , neurological , musculoskeletal , endocrine , metabolic , malignant , psychiatric , major physical impairment ) . Any clinically relevant abnormal finding physical examination , vital sign , clinical chemistry , haematology , urinalysis , , opinion investigator , may put subject risk participation study . QTc > 450 m QT > 500 m ECG abnormality make interpretation difficult , judged investigator , history additional risk factor Torsades de Points ( eg heart failure , hypokalemia , family history long QT syndrome ) . Radiation exposure clinical study , include present study , exclude background radiation include diagnostic Xrays medical exposure , exceed 5 mSv last twelve month 10 mSv last five year . Participation another clinical study investigational product last 3 month .
